title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the BioNanoAssembler platform, including target applications, desired features, performance goals, and any constraints or regulations.

title: Design System Architecture - Revised
description: Finalize and update the overall system architecture design for the BioNanoAssembler platform. The design should include components, interfaces, data flow, integration points with external systems or services, considering scalability, maintainability, performance requirements, security, fault tolerance, edge cases, error handling, and performance optimizations. Provide a detailed architecture diagram, documentation, and a comprehensive test plan for validation of the proposed architecture. Identify key subsystems or modules, specify the communication protocols and data formats between components, outline any necessary APIs or services for integration with third-party tools. Update the architecture to accommodate potential future growth and evolving project requirements. Include a section detailing how the design addresses privacy concerns and compliance with relevant industry standards. Ensure seamless integration with both frontend and backend components, as well as databases and external services. Consider implementing a modular architecture that allows for easy maintenance and future expansion. If there are any dependencies that need to be addressed before starting the implementation phase, please specify them clearly. Additionally, provide guidelines on software configuration management, version control, and deployment strategies within the documentation. In case of any changes in project requirements or dependencies, update the task accordingly. Upon completion, please share the updated architecture design with the team for review.

title: Develop Molecular Modeling and Simulation Tools
description: Implement tools and libraries for modeling and simulating the behavior of bio-inspired nanomachines at the molecular level.

title: Build User Interface and Visualization Components
description: Develop the user interface and visualization components for designing, simulating, and analyzing bio-inspired nanomachines.

title: Implement Manufacturing and Assembly Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms and tools for optimizing the manufacturing and assembly processes of bio-inspired nanomachines.

title: Establish Data Management and Storage - Update (v2)
description: This updated RFC aims to design, implement, and optimize a robust, scalable, and secure data management and storage system for our BioNanoAssembler project. The system will handle molecular models, simulation data, manufacturing instructions, and other relevant data efficiently, supporting retrieval, versioning, backup, and disaster recovery mechanisms. It will comply with data privacy and security regulations, offering real-time monitoring, access controls, audit logs, and disaster recovery capabilities. Collaborate with the assigned team members for system architecture design, data format standardization, and compatibility with existing project infrastructure. Upon completion of the design phase, conduct a thorough review to validate the architecture and ensure scalability, performance, and adherence to best practices. Once approved, proceed to implementation. Incorporate additional features such as data compression for efficient storage and retrieval, support for big data analysis tools like TensorFlow and scikit-learn, and integration with cloud services for scalable data storage and accessibility. Engage with third-party consultants or academic institutions if necessary for emerging technologies in this field. Upon completion of the implementation phase, a comprehensive testing phase will follow, including stress tests, security audits, and usability tests to validate system functionality and performance. Update the rfc_state to 'REVISED'.

title: Develop Comprehensive Security and Access Control Mechanisms for BioNanoAssembler Platform (Revised)
description: Implement a robust security solution with access control mechanisms to protect sensitive data, implement user authentication methods, establish authorization rules, and ensure secure communication protocols are utilized. Adhere to best practices in information security throughout the platform development process. Additionally, consider integrating multi-factor authentication for added security and regular security audits for continuous improvement.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the BioNanoAssembler platform, including automated testing and deployment processes.

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing and Validation Strategies (Revised)
description: Update the current plan for comprehensive testing and validation strategies for the BioNanoAssembler platform. This includes, but is not limited to, unit tests, integration tests, performance tests, functional tests, regression tests, and stress tests to ensure the robustness and reliability of the platform. The revised plan should include test cases, test data preparation guidelines, and execution procedures. Additionally, consider implementing automatic testing for continuous integration and delivery using tools such as Jenkins or CircleCI, and specify the relevant plugins/extensions to be used. Furthermore, provide a detailed timeline for the completion of each testing phase, including milestones and key deliverables. Finally, ensure that the documentation is clear, concise, and easily understandable by all team members. If there are any dependencies on other tasks or RFCs, please specify them clearly.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides for the BioNanoAssembler platform, covering installation, usage, and maintenance.
